alert.note: Alert for Chase; Hayes; Keith; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 9:40PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Perkins, south central Keith, northeastern Chase, southwestern Lincoln and northwestern Hayes Counties through 1030 PM CDT/930 PM MDT/... At 940 PM CDT/840 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grant, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grant, Wauneta, Wallace, Madrid, Elsie, Dickens, Grainton and Wild Horse Spring. This includes Highway 61 between mile markers 49 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in North Platte.
